org.ow2.proactive.jmx

Class JMXAuthenticatorImpl

    JMXAuthenticator

extends Object

    Class to perform the authentication for the JMX MBean Server.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public Subject authenticate(Object rawCredentials)
        This method is automatically called when a JMX client tries to connect to the MBean Server referred by the connector.

        The only allowed credentials structure provided by the client is Object[] that contains username/password (String/String) or username/Credentials

        Specified by:
        authenticate in interface JMXAuthenticator
        Parameters:
        rawCredentials - the credentials provided by the client
        Returns:
        a subject with the username as JMXPrincipal and the role as pubCredentials Subject
